definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: Toss the pancetta into a large pot, preferably a big, heavy dutch oven.
sentences.chinese: 將鹹肉碎放入一個大鍋內，最好是大的重的荷蘭烤盤。

sentences.english: Put the bread cuts onto the baking tray and toast the bread in the oven.
sentences.chinese: 將麪包切片放在烤盤上，送進烤箱烘烤。

sentences.english: Then put it in the baking tray or in the electric baking pan and you should put some oil under it first.
sentences.chinese: 把它放入烤盤或是電餅鐺中，先放一些油在下面。

sentences.english: Place 1 inch apart on the baking sheets until you've filled two baking sheets.
sentences.chinese: 放置在烤盤中時，每一條間距1英寸，裝滿兩個烤盤。

sentences.english: Put them on a pan to place in the oven.
sentences.chinese: 把切好的餅乾放在烤盤上，進烤箱。

sentences.english: Put squares on baking tray, and then move into oven.
sentences.chinese: 將切好的方塊放入烤盤，進烤箱。

sentences.english: Place a pan filled with 8 C. boiling water in the oven to create a moist oven.
sentences.chinese: 取另一個烤盤放8杯開水，製造一個溼潤的環境。

sentences.english: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Line a baking tray with non-stick tin foil.
sentences.chinese: 烤箱預熱至325度，烤盤撲上一層錫箔紙。

sentences.english: Place bread, cut-side up, on baking sheet.
sentences.chinese: 麪包切面朝上放到烤盤上。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
